translation: At the time when human life span was 80,000 years, this Buddha appeared in the world.
He planted the kṣatriyas.
His family name was Kauṇḍinya.
His father, Pāṇḍubhavyūha, and mother, Pāṇḍubhavyūha.
He lived in the city of Padmavṛṣṭi.
He sat under a palm tree and preached the Dharma.

source_sentence: 三會度人三十四萬八千人。
translation: The three assemblies were attended by 3,800 people.
There are two kinds of supernormal abilities.
One is a delicious tea.
The second is called Tiṣya.
The attendants had no sorrow.
The son then venerated it.

source_sentence: 尸棄佛(莊嚴劫第九百九十九尊)偈曰。
translation: Śikhin Buddha (the ninth hundred and ninety-nine honored ones of the adorned eon) said in verse.
The good qualities that arise are originally illusory.
Making bad actions is also illusory.
The body is like foam, and the mind is like wind.
It's an illusion that produces the absence of faculties and the absence of reality.

source_sentence: 人壽七萬歲時此佛出世。
translation: At the time when human life span was 70,000 years, this Buddha appeared in the world.
He planted the kṣatriyas.
His family name was Kauṇḍinya.
The father explains the characteristics.
His mother was Guangyao.
He lived in the city of Guangming Xiang.
He sat under a puṇḍarī tree and preached the Dharma.
In the three assemblies, there were 220,000 people who converted.
There are two kinds of supernormal abilities.
One is called abhidharma.
The second is called Upāsaka.
The attendants tolerate walking.
The children are immeasurable.

source_sentence: 毘舍浮佛(莊嚴劫第一千尊)偈曰。
translation: Vaiśravaṇa Buddha (the first thousand honored ones of the world age of adornment) said in verse.
Suppose he borrows the four elements as his body.
The mind is originally nonexistent, and the causes and objects are present.
If the prior object is absent, the mind is also absent.
Sins and merits are illusory and arisen, but they also cease.

source_sentence: 人壽六萬歲時此佛出世。
translation: At the time when human life span was sixty thousand years, this Buddha appeared in the world.
He planted the kṣatriyas.
His family name was Kauṇḍinya.
His father, Sunetra.

He sat under a palm tree and preached the Dharma.
The second assembly was attended by 130,000 people.
There are two kinds of supernormal abilities.
One was Fuyou.
The second is called the gandharva.
The attendants ceased.
The son of Marvelous Enlightenment.

translation: Krakucchanda Buddha (seen in the first honored one of the good eon) said in verse.
Seeing the body as insubstantial is the Buddha's body.

translation: At the time when human life span was forty thousand years, this Buddha appeared in the world.
He planted a brāhmaṇa.
His family name was Kāśyapa.
His father paid homage to him.
His mother is a good branch.

In one assembly, 40,000 people were liberated.
There are two kinds of supernormal abilities.
One is the sattva.
The second is Vairocana.
The attendant, Shanjue.
The son is superior.

source_sentence: 拘那含牟尼佛(賢劫第二尊)偈曰。
translation: Kanakamuni Buddha (the second honored one of the good eon) said in verse.
The Buddha doesn't see the Buddha and knows he's a Buddha.
If someone really has knowledge, they'll know that there's no Buddha separately.
A wise person can know the emptiness of the nature of sin.
He's calm and doesn't fear birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 人壽三萬歲時此佛出世。
translation: At the time when human life span was 30,000 years, this Buddha appeared in the world.
He planted a brāhmaṇa.
His family name was Kāśyapa.
His father was a great virtuous man.
His mother was good and superior.
He lived in a pure city.
He sat under an udumbara tree and preached the Dharma.
In one assembly, 30,000 people were liberated.
There are two kinds of supernormal abilities.
One is Śubhaṇa.
The second is the storeyed tower.
The attendant Anhe.
Zi Daoshi.

source_sentence: 迦葉佛(賢劫第三尊)偈曰。
translation: Kāśyapa Buddha (the third honored one of the good eon) said in verse.
All sentient beings are inherently pure.
From the originally nonexistent, there's nothing to be produced and nothing to be ceased.
That is, this body and mind are illusory birth.
In illusory transformation, there's no sin or merit.
